get.summary: Get invitation info by already registered user

409.description: Invitation isn't for a current user

get.summary: Get invitation info by not authenticated user

mailboxes.description: Mailboxes names. At least one mailbox name must be set.

id.description: Identifier in DB. Shouldn't be set for creation.

documentId.description: Document ID to create new comment thread

values.description: List of dictionary record values {columnUuid: fieldValue}

createdAt.description: The date the approval was created

expiredAfter.description: The date the envelope will be expired

seenAt.description: Date-time it was seen by approver

completed.description: Number of participants who completed their processing

labels.description: UUID of labels for this envelope for this mailbox

receivedAt.description: Date of receiving the envelope by the mailbox

mailboxUuid.description: UUID of mailbox assigned to role

mailboxName.description: Name of the mailbox role assigned to

order.description: Role order as defined in template

seenAt.description: Date-time it was seen by receiver

sentByMe.description: Flag meaning 'outbox'. Probably not necessary on UI

access.description: Link access level, account-wide by default

categories.description: Template categories ids and their accessLevels. Null or empty array if not within any category.

email.description: Email for which invitation was created

in.description: Integration rule direction, true: in, false: out

matchingPatternSrc.description: File matching pattern source: name or content

in.description: Rule direction, true = IN, false = OUT

mailboxUuid.description: UUID of mailbox for applying rule for

map.description: XSLT map to use for transformation

namingRule.description: Naming pattern rule. Tokens allowed: {mailboxUuid}, {envelopeUuid}, {randomNumber}, {templateUuid}, {date yyyy-MM-dd_HH-mm-ss}. Forbidden characters are: \/:?*<>|

templateUuid.description: UUID of the template to use for generated envelope

fileName.description: File name generated by pattern rule from request

completed.description: Number of roles completed processing of this envelope

templateName.description: Name of the template of this envelope

total.description: Total number of roles assigned for processing of this envelope

envelopes.description: List of envelopes UUID to assign

uuid.description: UUID of Label. Only for entity read from server.

permissions.description: Permissions for current user to mailbox relation
Permissions for current user to mailbox relation

theme.description: The name of the UI theme

categories.description: Template categories ids and their accessLevels. Null or empty array if not within any category.
